Compute P-values for Single Covariate

Source: R/core_optimal_K.R
compute_pvals.Rd

Computes Z-scores and p-values for a single covariate in a specific cell type.

Usage

compute_pvals(
  input_list,
  cell_type,
  effect_name,
  beta_name = "beta_estimate",
  standard_error_name = "standard_error_matrix",
  sided = 2,
  direction = "pos"
)

Arguments

input_list

A list of model outputs with beta and standard error matrices.

cell_type

Character. Cell type of interest.

effect_name

Character. Name of the covariate/effect of interest.

beta_name

Name of the beta matrix in each model output (default: "beta_estimate").

standard_error_name

Name of the standard error matrix (default: "standard_error_matrix").

sided

Integer. 1 for one-sided, 2 for two-sided test.

direction

Character. "pos" or "neg", used if sided = 1.

Value

A named list of p-values for each model in the input list.
